Cmp3\Config

Class ConfigIterator

All Implemented Interfaces:

Iterator
public class ConfigIterator
implements Iterator

Iterator for config object
Example
TS Setup:

parts { 10.something = abc 20.something = xyz 30.another = 123 40 = gfsd }
Usage:

$objConfigIterator = new \Cmp3\Config\ConfigIterator ($objJobConfig, 'parts.');
foreach($objConfigIterator as $key => $objConfig) { $someValue = $objConfig->GetValue('something'); }
The Iterator will never use '40' because there's no '40.'!
Therefore $someValue will be: abc, xyz, NULL
STATUS: beta
